mapper.insert: insert into StudentClassRoom(classRoomNumber, classRoomName, classRoomInfo, standardPeopleAmount, typeFlag) values (#{classRoomNumber}, #{classRoomName}, #{classRoomInfo}, #{standarPeopleAmount}, #{typeFlag})
mapper.select: select id, classRoomNumber, classRoomName, classRoomInfo, standardPeopleAmount, typeFlag from StudentClassRoom where id = #{id}
